result.execSummary:
The defendant Devon L. Brown was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Devon L. Brown is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Devon L. Brown was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $50.00 MONTH PAYMENT PLAN TO COMMENCE ON OR BEFORE SEPTEMBER 5, 2015. $15 PAYMENT PLAN FEE TO BE ADDED

records.addlTxt: Defendant's copy of Commitment Order returned undeliverable - Unable to Forward per USPS

Defendant Devon L. Brown in court with attorney Mark Jay Gumz and Student Intern Josh Andresen.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Atty Hendee states plea agreement to Ct. 1.  Ct. 2 to be dismissed.  Mr. Andresen agrees.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees and enters a No Contest plea.
  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.  Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds defendant guilty of Ct. 1.  Ct. 2 to be dismissed.

Intern Josh Andresen makes a statement to the court.

BY THE COURT:  Ct. 1:  Court Costs = $243.00
DNA Sample + $200.00 Surcharge
  Defendant agrees to the $15.00 payment plan fee.
Payment Plan:  $50.00/month commencing in September
Ct. 2 to be dismissed.
Credit = 2 days if needed
$30.75 that the COC has will be applied to this

Atty Gumz files an authorization with the court.
Atty Gumz states that the Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.  Atty Gumz enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant.

BY THE COURT:  Not Guilty plea entered.
Set for Return.
bond continued.  Return date scheduled for August 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Devon L. Brown in court with attorney Mark Jay Gumz. appearing by telephone.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Atty Hendee states that the defendant did receive a copy of the criminal complaint.    Atty Hendee has no objection to a signature bond with conditions.
